variables.desc: Fire Emblem is a tactical role-playing game series developed by Intelligent Systems and published by Nintendo. The series is known for its strategic gameplay, its complex characters, and its engaging storylines. Fire Emblem has been ported to a variety of consoles and handhelds, and it has also spawned a number of spin-offs.
